description:
First, ninja trainee Shinobu is sent on a mission by her Head Master to collect underwear from high school girls! Her first target? Kaede Shiranui! Then, Shinobu takes Kaede on a crazy adventure to the Valley of the Ninja to meet her Head Master!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Shinobu, A Ninja Aprendiz, Aparece! / II. O Mestre Aparece!
La légende de Shinobu, l`apprentie ninja / Le maître fait son apparition
Minarai Ninja, Shinobu Kenzan no Maki / Touryou, Arawaru no Maki
Ninja Trainee Shinobu / The Head Master Appears
見習い忍者, 忍見参の巻 / 頭領, 現るの巻
